extendedInfo.description: *** FREE & FULL FEATURED (ad-supported) ***Sokoban at its greatest! Follow an ancient Inca trail and help Marv The Miner unlock the ruins in this mind-twisting sokoban puzzle.Are you stuck? Join us on Facebook to get help: facebook.com/digiment*** REVIEWS ***"Box It! 2 for Android definitely is the best puzzle game you never seen before, for people who's searching for some alternative puzzle games, this one shouldn't be ignored." - AppEggs.com"The game features mysterious, simplistic music, and is fun to play." - Android App Review Sources"Must have if you like puzzle games. In fact, if this is your kind of thing youâll probably be hooked for a period of time.  Even if you have an inkling of curiosity in this game then go and give it a try â thereâs a free version after all." - Android Games Review---What lies beneath the ancient Inca ruins in the mines of Kazarakt remains a mystery, but as legend has it, they hold vast gold, jewels and treasures. In this adventure, follow an ancient Inca trail and help Marv The Miner unlock the ruins in this mind-twisting sokoban puzzle game. Push rock totems to the lock mechanisms found on the ground. Once all totems are securely in place, the entrance to the ruin opens and awards a treasure. With 100 entrances to open, Marv The Miner needs help navigating his way through each puzzle.Features---------- FREE & FULL FEATURED version with 100 challenging levels- Great Inca theme with nice music- Hours of mind twisting fun- Watch out for the spikes- Bonus score for fewer steps and quicker solutions- Share your hiscore

reviews.title: Control is very poor
reviews.comment: I was very excited bout the game, ended up VERY disappointed, character moves in different directions with out me pressing.
reviews.author: Edgar Martinez

reviews.title: Ruined great game
reviews.comment: Not all map is not visible. Poor control.

reviews.title: Graphics Broken. Slow movements
reviews.comment: The graphics of the little guy are broken making it very hard to figure out what space you are on. Each movement is pretty slow & the D-Pad reacts sloe. Good concept but just like most puzzle games where you move stuff around.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Crashes before game starts!!! Update ruined game.
